resources.string: This scene is completed Darling.\n\n Please go back to the map or buy exciting things from the store

"Here is your final Avatar!\nPress continue to start\n your journey.."
"Here is your final Avatar! Press continue to start\n your journey.."
Design your own avatar, go on adventures, and learn about sex education with the PowerUp app.

You can customise your avatar however you like: choose from a range of clothing, bags, accessories, and even personal characteristics such as eyes. Save up karma points to buy cool new accessories for your avatar, or perhaps a new item of clothing. \n\nTo gain these karma points, you and your avatar can go on adventures, making powerful decisions and learning about sex education. Changed your mind about something your avatar did? You always have the option of replaying a scene.

We live in a time where sexual activity is becoming increasingly common amongst adolescents and even preadolescents. Sex education at school or information from parents/guardians and can be very awkward too, making it more challenging for you to know what to do when confronted with such a situation in real life. PowerUp is a game that will help you discover and learn through interaction with other characters, such as a friend from school.
